mapper.select: SELECT ums_member.id, ums_member.member_level_id, ums_member.username, ums_member.password, ums_member.nickname, ums_member.phone, ums_member.status, ums_member.create_time, ums_member.icon, ums_member.gender, ums_member.birthday, ums_member.city, ums_member.job, ums_member.personalized_signature, ums_member.source_type, ums_member.integration, ums_member.growth, ums_member.luckey_count, ums_member.history_integration FROM ums_member
